sub_title: Associate professor in Mathematics Education and research
summary: My main area of interest is mathematical learning with interactive technologies. At the moment I teach mathematics pedagogy, practice-based research and digital pedagogy to in-service teachers. I investigate mathematics learning with Digital games, digital manipulatives and computational thinking.
